subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort in Rajasthan was built by Raja Jai Singh?
question_hi: राजस्थान में राजा जैसिंग ने कैलिंग बनाई गई थी।
explanation_en: Amber Fort is a famous fort in Jaipur, but the correct answer is Kumbhalgarh Fort, which was built by Rana Kumbha.
explanation_hi: अम्बर किलिंग राजा कुम्बालगढ़ किलिंग ने बना।
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Rana Kumbha?
question_hi: राजा कुम्बालगढ़ किलिंग ने कैलिंग क्या बना।
